snippet: Nebraska used to win in numbing, overwhelming fashion, but even the most spoiled fans are getting used to the current reality under Coach Bo Pelini.
abstract: Nebraska used to win in numbing, overwhelming fashion, but even the most spoiled fans are getting used to the current reality under Coach Bo Pelini.
lead_paragraph: I was walking through the office when a colleague stopped me. "Did I hear you say something about Nebraska football?" he asked, innocently, cheerfully, not realizing the twisted synapses that were about to fire in my brain. I frowned and shook my head over the idea of writing about the team. "My comments would be too blue," I assured him glibly.

headline.main: A Nebraska Fan Faces the New Reality
